item.title: DIS
item.description: score:107 Chances: The merger between Reliance Industries Ltd. and Walt Disney Co. has created a media giant with extensive reach in India Nelson Peltz’s manifesto for change at Walt Disney Co. highlights potential areas for improvement in the company’s strategy and governance Collaboration between Fox, Disney’s ESPN, and Warner Bros.
